description.raw:
- Replaced calls to `ros::Publisher's` `getNumSubscribers()` by a local counter. I see an increase in 0.02~0.03 in RTF by doing so. I am not entirely sure why. While the function call takes around tens of microsec, it seems to lock a mutex that has side effects on performance.

- Keep track of tactile publisher's subscriber count in SandiaHandPlugin. Around another 0.04 increase in RTF if there are no subscribers to the tactile sensor while atlas's hands are in contact with other collisions.
description.html:
• Replaced calls to ros::Publisher's getNumSubscribers() by a local counter. I see an increase in 0.02~0.03 in RTF by doing so. I am not entirely sure why. While the function call takes around tens of microsec, it seems to lock a mutex that has side effects on performance.

  • Keep track of tactile publisher's subscriber count in SandiaHandPlugin. Around another 0.04 increase in RTF if there are no subscribers to the tactile sensor while atlas's hands are in contact with other collisions.

title: Avoid publishing when no subscribers
